name: Relinquished Puppet
text:
Send 1 Level 8 "Gimmick Puppet" monster in your hand or Deck to your Graveyard. Then, play 1 "Gimmick Puppet Des Troy" from outside of your Deck.
This Skill can only be used if you begin the Duel with a Deck/Extra Deck containing at least 1 monster and no monsters other than "Gimmick Puppet" or DARK Xyz Monsters. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
